title: #185: Breaking It Down: Madeleine McCann
description:
Laura Richards and Jim Clemente discuss with Lisa Zambetti your questions, break down the timeline as well as the various hypotheses about what happened to Madeleine McCann on May 3 2007 in Praia Da Luz.

If you have any information about Madeleine McCann in the UK:

(T): +44 (0) 207 321 9251

(E): Operation.grange@met.pnn.police.uk


The Polícia Judiciária in Portugal:

(T): +351 282 405 400

(E): Dic.portimao@pj.pt



If you would like to help Emma Shave fundraise for victims of stalking and Paladin National Stalking Advocacy Service, please visit her Just Giving Page - every penny counts to help and reach more victims:

www.justgiving.com/fundraising/paintforpaladin


Don't miss out! Come to CrimeCon in New Orleans June 7-9 https://www.crimecon.com/crimecon-2019-home

Use our code and get a 10% discount REALCRIMEPROFILE19

We look forwarding to seeing you there!
